verses.verse: Thinkest <S%H2803><s%> thou this to be thy <S%H4941>right<s%>, Or <S%H559>sayest<s%> <S%H6664>thou<s%>, My righteousness is more than <S%H410>God<s%>'s,
That thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, What <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be unto <S%H3276>thee<s%>? And, What profit shall I <S%H2403>have<s%>, more than if I had sinned?
I will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H7453>thee<s%>, And thy companions with thee.
Look <S%H5027><s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; And <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%>, which are higher than <S%H1361>thou<s%>.
If thou hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, what <S%H6466>effectest<s%> thou against <S%H6588>him<s%>? And if thy transgressions be <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>, what doest thou unto <S%H6213>him<s%>?
If thou be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>, what <S%H5414>givest<s%> thou <S%H3947>him<s%>? Or what receiveth he of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>?
Thy <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> may hurt a <S%H376>man<s%> as thou <S%H6666>art<s%>; And thy righteousness may profit a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
By reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they cry <S%H7768>out<s%>; They <S%H2199>cry<s%> for help by reason of the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty<s%>.
But none <S%H559>saith<s%>, Where is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>Maker<s%>, Who <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>,
Who <S%H502>teacheth<s%> us more than the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And maketh us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>?
There they <S%H6817>cry<s%>, but none giveth <S%H6030>answer<s%>, <S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men<s%>.
Surely <S%H410>God<s%> will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> an <S%H7723>empty<s%> <S%H7706>cry<s%>, Neither will the Almighty regard <S%H7789>it<s%>.
How <S%H637><s%> much less when thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> thou <S%H7789>beholdest<s%> him <S%H1779>not<s%>, The cause is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2342>him<s%>, and thou waitest for him!
But <S%H6485>now<s%>, because he hath not visited in his <S%H639>anger<s%>, Neither doth he <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3045>regard<s%> <S%H6580>arrogance<s%>;
